welcome.greeting:
🤖 Hello {name}!

Welcome to NFT Market Insights Bot! I'm here to help you track NFT collections, set price alerts, and stay updated with the latest market trends.

✨ **Let's get you started:**

🎯 Quick Actions:
• 💰 Check floor prices
• 🏆 Browse top collections
• 🔔 Set price alerts
• 🌍 Change language

Choose an option below or use /help for all commands!

tutorial.title: 🎓 **Quick Tutorial**
tutorial.step1:
**Step 1:** 💰 Check Collection Prices
Use `/price cryptopunks` to get floor price info
tutorial.step2:
**Step 2:** 🏆 Browse Rankings
Use `/rankings` to see top collections by volume
tutorial.step3:
**Step 3:** 🔔 Set Price Alerts
Use `/alerts add cryptopunks 50` to get notified
tutorial.step4:
**Step 4:** 🌍 Choose Your Language
Use `/language` to switch languages
tutorial.complete: 🎉 You're all set! Try any command to get started.

help.title:
🤖 **NFT Bot Help**

Available commands:

commands./price [collection]: 💰 Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands./rankings: 🏆 View top NFT collections by volume

help.usage:
💡 **Examples:**
• `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
• `/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 50` - Set alert at 50 ETH
• `/rankings` - Browse top collections

price_help.title: 💰 **Price Command Help**
price_help.description: Get real-time floor prices for any NFT collection.
examples: • `/price bored ape yacht club` - Get BAYC floor price
tips: • You can use full collection names or common abbreviations
• The bot will suggest similar collections if not found
• Results include 24h price change and volume data

rankings_help.title: 🏆 **Rankings Command Help**
rankings_help.description: Browse top NFT collections ranked by various metrics.
tips: • Use navigation buttons to browse through pages
• Click on any collection for detailed information

alerts_help.title: 🔔 **Alerts Command Help**
alerts_help.description: Set up to 10 price alerts for your favorite collections.
examples: • `/alerts add cryptopunks 100` - Alert when CryptoPunks hits 100 ETH
tips: • You can have up to 10 active alerts
• Alerts trigger when floor price crosses your target

price.usage: 💡 Please provide a collection name. Usage: /price <collection_name>
price.not_found: ❌ Collection '{collection}' not found. Please check the spelling and try again.
price.error: ⚠️ Error fetching price data. Please try again later.

rankings.title: 🏆 **Top NFT Collections**
rankings.error: ❌ Error fetching rankings. Please try again later.
rankings.no_data: ❌ No rankings data available at the moment.

alerts.help:
🔔 **NFT Price Alerts**

**Commands:**
`/alerts list` - View your active alerts
`/alerts add <collection> <price>` - Add price alert
`/alerts remove <id>` - Remove alert by ID

**Examples:**
`/alerts add cryptopunks 50` - Alert when CryptoPunks floor hits 50 ETH
`/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 30` - Alert for BAYC at 30 ETH

💡 *Alerts check prices every hour*
alerts.list_empty:
📋 **Your Active Alerts**

🔄 No active alerts found.

Use `/alerts add <collection> <price>` to create your first alert!
alerts.add_usage:
❌ Please provide collection name and target price.

Usage: `/alerts add <collection> <price>`
Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.invalid_price:
❌ Invalid price format. Please enter a valid number.

Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.add_success:
✅ **Alert Created!**

📊 Collection: {collection}
💰 Target Price: {price} ETH

🔔 You'll be notified when the floor price reaches your target.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.remove_usage:
❌ Please provide alert ID to remove.

Usage: `/alerts remove <id>`
Use `/alerts list` to see your alert IDs.
alerts.remove_success:
✅ **Alert Removed**

🗑️ Alert ID {alert_id} has been removed.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.unknown_command:
❌ Unknown alerts command.

Use `/alerts` to see available options.
alerts.error: ❌ Sorry, something went wrong with alerts. Please try again later.
alerts.title: 🔔 **Price Alert Management**
alerts.no_alerts:
📭 You have no active price alerts.

To set an alert, use: /alert <collection> <price>
alerts.max_alerts: ⚠️ You have reached the maximum limit of 10 alerts. Please remove an existing alert before adding a new one.
alerts.set_error: ❌ Error setting alert. Please try again.

errors.general: ❌ Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.api_error: 🔌 API error. Please try again later.
errors.invalid_input: ⚠️ Invalid input. Please check your command.
errors.network_error: 🌐 Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.timeout: ⏰ Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.invalid_command: ❌ Invalid command. Use /help to see available commands.

search.instructions: 🔍 Search Collections To search for a specific NFT collection, simply type: /price [collection name] For example: • /price bored ape • /price cryptopunks • /price azuki The bot will find the collection and show you the current floor price and market data!
